wikipedia_page.main:
For other people of the same name, see Phil WilliamsPhilip Williams (born 5 April 1958, Birkenhead) is an English former footballer.
A product of Chester's youth policy, Williams made a solitary appearance in The Football League for the club when wearing the number nine shirt during a 0–0 draw at home to Preston North End on 11 September 1976.He did not make any further first-team appearances for Chester and later played for Cray Wanderers.
